column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4878_540ac4514dbe4e077917bad1750768218ef5f9cf/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
I'd suggest clarifying that error message a little.\n
Right, it should have least the peer id\n
The error is entirely consistent with other errors in ProcessMessage, so I'll keep it like this. The "misbehaving" message itself will already log more information about the peer.\n
